data.title: Guide to the Afrika Bambaataa hip hop archive,circa 1972
data.text:
Container

Description

Date

Series IX. Music collection

12 inch vinyl

Series contains vinyl discs that were selected by DJ Shadow and DJ Cut Creator and played on their Renegades of Rhythm tour.

Arranged by Box number.

All of these records have been individually described. More information about each LP can be found in the library catalog.

DJ Shadow selections.
